name: DeleteCardFromBoard
description:
Delete a card item from a Miro board.

Use this tool to delete a specific card item from a Miro board when you need to manage board content. Ensure you have the necessary authorization with 'boards:write' scope to perform this action.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique ID of the board from which the card item will be deleted. Ensure it is valid and corresponds to the target board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: card_item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the card item to delete from the Miro board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the item.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the item that you want to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
